html:
3.31.20  7:44 am   If your coolness is caused by some type of defense mechanism, why my defense mechanism is crying in my bed and fall apart?

     that is a very important step of the coolness process

3.31.20  7:02 am   Your extremely funny and that's a fact

     i can think of something even more funny, and that's seriousness

3.31.20  6:33 am   How can you be so good? You inspired me to make music, and 3 years in I'm nowhere as good as you...

You're an amazing artist!!! 

     detecting friendliness at dangerous levels

3.31.20  6:26 am   Do you have corona

     not unless it literally jumped off the box i just carried inside

3.31.20  5:37 am   bill did you ever try listening to ASMR? it can help ppl relax easily

     back in my day that was called whispering

3.31.20  4:58 am   Who in your early life other than yourself helped grow your ability to make music?

     my mother

3.31.20  4:28 am   When I was young I thought that only what was immediately around me existed. Like things had to pop into existence as I walked and went away once I was far enough away. Being older now and knowing about the world I still struggle to comprehend just how many people and stuff there is on the planet. Ya'know? There being so much stuff makes me worry. 

     i have some good news. a lot of that stuff is good

3.31.20  4:24 am   when you went to new canaan were you actually hungry and starving for food and women

     no, i was starving for stories and adventures, but mostly songwriting

3.31.20  4:05 am   never mind. i just found out you don't like genre names so ignore that post-punk question. instead i would like to know what is your favorite part of a bird?

     the wings

3.31.20  3:34 am   How are you doing Bill? I'm personally doing okay besides the fact I feel down and sick a lot recently. Your videos are a thing of beauty and your videos never cease to bring a smile to my face. When I'm feeling down listening to your songs is like an emotional support dog, thanks for everything you do and have a great day

     holy consortium internationale of oceanography, you have reached a pinacle stage in the saga of friendlinessness

3.31.20  3:25 am   We need a video about the virus outbreaks of history, and now. Could you do that?

     no, there's 2 reasons i should not make that video. 1. i don't like viruses, and 2. i don't like to deliberately make videos about topics which are currently trending explosively. you might be confusing me with literally anyone else

3.31.20  3:23 am   Will you make a nice detailed video about... Bread?

     sure

3.31.20  2:55 am   are you ever going to make more songs with the bwb?

     of course

3.31.20  2:53 am   how did you came up with your style

     just trying to get by

3.31.20  2:42 am   what is soap made out of

     poison

3.31.20  2:20 am   Who's your favorite musician?

     it's my job to be it. whether or not i am achieving that goal, is open for debate, but the debate is irrelevant because either way i am still supposed to be even better

3.31.20  2:13 am   New fan and I wanted to know, do you have a weird process to the making of your songs?

     no, it is a very normal, reasonable process

3.31.20  1:56 am   How competitive can sports be

     put it this way. there are 2 teams and only 1 ball

3.31.20  1:49 am   how do you do all the things 

     impossible. there is no such thing as things

3.31.20  1:43 am   what is your least favourite food

     poison

3.31.20  1:35 am   what is your favorrite post-punk album?

     i don't know any albums

3.31.20  1:31 am   3.29.20  10:41 pm does this include the two 'hello's at the start of the song?

     no, that's a pickup. 'sex' would be beat 1 bar 1

3.31.20  1:11 am   your music is amazing thank you for being amazing

     holy smokehouse, how did you get so friendly and just overwhelmingly cordial

3.31.20  1:07 am   Hey Bill just wondering why is it taking so long to upload

     the bigger your file size is, the longer the upload will take. you could try a lower bit rate maybe

      and btw I love to watch you videos and little clips they are amazing. How you are doing great in quarantine =)

3.31.20  1:03 am   I kinda have reoccurring thoughts of whether or not I'm happy pursuing my degree at college. I feel like I have no control over what I do and im just doing what's expected of me, im pretty unhappy. What would you do bill

     i have no idea. i don't know what a college degree is, means, or does, and each time i've tried to think about it i understand it less

3.31.20  12:55 am   what is good name for pizza?

     pizza

     I have a lot
of question about it

3.31.20  12:15 am   What is the most strange question?

     i don't remember because questions above a certain level of strangeness cause me to black out

3.30.20  11:48 pm   if you could go back in time would you time in go back?

     well in that case i already did

3.30.20  11:46 pm   why are we stocking up on toilet paper when we could be stocking up on cheese

     no one is stocking up on toilet paper. someone already did

3.30.20  11:42 pm   did you know that you are a living legend. just wanted to let you know :)

     holy houseboat, you are very friendly

3.30.20  11:41 pm   do u ever get annoyed answering these questions?

     each one makes me stronger. and i admit i am getting annoyed with all the strength

3.30.20  11:32 pm   Opinion on socks

     alarmingly good

3.30.20  11:27 pm   Do you have a favorite story?

     real life

     Have you ever thought about writing one?

     yes

3.30.20  11:07 pm   How does one become bill wurtz 

     it's simple. just bite off way more than you can chew

3.30.20  10:58 pm   How big are your aspirations?

     about the same size as our home planet

3.30.20  10:35 pm   Can you prove you're a real human being, and not a fictional character?

     yes

3.30.20  10:23 pm   Why don't you watch your videos after you've made them?

     that time should be used for making more videos. a lot of people who watch my videos don't make their own videos, so if they and me are both watching my videos, then who's gonna make the videos. as you can see, nature would fall out of balance that way

3.30.20  10:18 pm   how do i feel better about myself

     i can think of 2 ways. actually be better, or realize you already are better than you thought you were

3.30.20  10:13 pm   Thoughts on college degree in graphic design?

     never heard of it

3.30.20  10:09 pm   Favorite type of tree? 

     huge

3.30.20  9:51 pm   we need a video where corona is earth's end

     there are already plenty of videos like that

3.30.20  9:48 pm   you always talk about how you are trying to make videos as fast as possible. Why? We appreciate you and your content and to me, at least, im fine with waiting if it means you can hold on to some sanity and feel less stressed.

     ok. how long are you willing to wait

3.30.20  9:46 pm   Hey Bill. I watch your videos sometimes. When will your next video be?

     i'm having a countdown timer

3.30.20  9:30 pm   Bill Wurtz, inspire me

     i will try

3.30.20  9:28 pm   Wha'tre you doin'g to keep yo'ureself sane durin'g the q'uarantin'e?

     making some long overdue developments and adjustments in the video department

3.30.20  9:24 pm   thoughts on planes?

     they're taking a break

3.30.20  9:09 pm   Is it very complicated to think of ideas for a video?

     no. the part where it gets complicated is taking those imaginary ideas and making them real

3.30.20  8:41 pm   Would you want to participate in a sort of virtual choir?

     that seems nearly impossible because of the severe delays that exist in every remote form of communication available today. i get anxiety thinking of all the people who must be attempting this in recent times

3.30.20  8:29 pm   you will make more videos in the future?? :D

     hark, an understatement

3.30.20  8:17 pm   do you normally social distance yourself even when there is no virus 

     only for professional reasons
